DOC.brief_summary: This observational study design evaluate effect Twynsta tablets life style modification blood pressure , quality life , risk factor Korean patient hypertension routine clinical practice setting .
DOC.brief_title: Twynsta Study With Lifestyle Modifications Korean Patients With Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Patients essential hypertension whose blood pressure adequately control amlodipine telmisartan monotherapy ( =140/90 mmHg , = 130/80 mmHg diabetes kidney disease ) 2 . Age = 19 year enrollment 3 . Male female patient ( legally acceptable representative ) willing able provide write informed consent Exclusion criterion : 1 . Patients previous exposure Twynsta 2 . Patients hypersensitivity active substance , dihydropyridine derivative 3 . Female patient second third trimester pregnancy 4 . Female patient lactation 5 . Patients biliary obstructive disorder 6 . Patients severe hepatic impairment 7 . Patients high grade aortic stenosis 8 . Patients shock 9 . Patients hereditary condition intolerance excipient product 10 . Current participation clinical trial observational study
